name: Canto
author: Canto Inc

sections.description: Simplify collaboration: Publish media from Canto to WordPress. Browse/search your library directly. Inserted images save to WordPress.
sections.installation:
Installing Canto wordpress plugin can be done either by searching for “Canto” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Configure and authorize your account under “Settings > Canto” left nav menu. Click “Connect” and enter in your account credentials. You will be automatically redirected back to WordPress.

All set, enjoy!
sections.faq:
Canto Help

For help installing or using the plugin, refer to Canto Help

Can I use this plugin without a Canto account?

Unfortunately not. However, you are welcome to sign up today for free! Start free trial

How do I authorize my account?

We recommend you to connect to your Canto account using an administrator account.

short_description: Find & publish creative assets to WordPress easily, no email or folder search needed, with Canto's digital asset management.
description: Simplify collaboration: Publish media from Canto to WordPress. Browse/search your library directly. Inserted images save to WordPress.

• 2019-10-10
  • FIX: The tree structure data is too large to be rendered. Now load the first layer for the first time.

screenshots.caption: Find media assets quickly with Canto digital asset management
Insert into Post directly from our CDN
Inserts a native Gutenberg block with customizable options and formatting
Plugin settings include duplicate checking and automatic updates for assets imported in WordPress
